bibl.title: An Inscribed Gold Phylactery in Stamford, Connecticut.
bibl.note: Permanent exhibit at the headquarters of the Xerox Corporation, Inv. 51/4740 DUO. Provenance unknown, fourth century A.D. The commentary refers to magical papyri.
Faraone Christopher A. and Roy Kotansky, An Inscribed Gold Phylactery in Stamford, Connecticut.
ZPE 75 (1988) pp. 257-266, 1 fac-sim. et pl. IXa.
